alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 9:14AM EDT until September 21 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN KOSCIUSKO COUNTY... At 914 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winona Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Winona Lake, Silver Lake, Claypool, Burket, Sidney, Beaver Dam Lake, Packerton, Sevastopol and Palestine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
